title: These be the articles folovvynge the vvhiche the kynges grace hathe pardoned
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
notes: Henry VIII's accession pardon: a list of the crimes pardoned if committed before 24 April 1509.
Imprint from STC; Steele suggests R. Pynson as printer.
The first four words of the title are xlyographic, white on black.
In this edition, line 3 of text: prouffytes.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
